name: Brickwall Madness
description:
Version 0.1

This project was originally planned to be a simple level design exercise in maze creation, but it became so much more.

As of right now the basic asset pieces and gameplay prefabs are all created and I've created a prototype level to test out the mechanics.

A more fleshed out level is incoming, as well as new mechanics.

Current Feature List:

  • Standard Unity FPS character controller
  • Warping Geometry in the level layout
  • Gates with a variable number of triggers to open
  • Doors open on interaction

Controls:

  • Quit game with alt-f4
  • WSAD or Arrows to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to run
  • E or mouse left-click to interact

Thanks for playing.
